name: Slot Machine Racer
description:
Control you car with the extreme slot machine engine. Race to the finish line to win.

Use the slot machine to refill your fuel tank, boost speed and repair your car. But beware, you may break you ride too.

Made in 8 hours with tungkradle. Submission for Ludum Dare 41.

P.s: This is a prototype made with React.js in a short time. There will be bugs.
